biotools.summary: PlaPPISite is a comprehensive database presenting fine-grained protein-protein interaction (PPI) site annotations. It covers both experimentally verified and predicted PPIs for 13 plants including Chlamydomonas reinhardtii, Arabidopsis thaliana, Ricinus communis, Glycine max, Oryza sativa, Solanum lycopersicum, Solanum tuberosum, Vitis vinifera, Zea mays, Brachypodium distachyon, Selaginella moellendorffii, Populus trichocarpa and Medicago truncatula.
